name: Change User Password - Windows
description:
Changes the user password to hinder access attempts. Seen in use by LockerGoga. Upon execution, log into the user account "AtomicAdministrator" with
the password "HuHuHUHoHo283283".

input_arguments.name: user_account
input_arguments.description: User account whose password will be changed.

input_arguments.name: new_user_password
input_arguments.description: Password to use if user account must be created first

input_arguments.name: new_password
input_arguments.description: New password for the specified account.
